actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to amend rule XVI of the Standing Rules of the Senate with respect to the priority of deciding certain points of order made against amendments to general appropriation bills.

summary.text: Amends rule XVI of the Standing Rules of the Senate to provide that if a point of order is made against an amendment to a general appropriations bill on certain grounds, then it shall not be in order to raise the defense of germaneness unless there is House legislative language on that subject contained in the bill.

titles.title: A resolution to amend rule XVI of the Standing Rules of the Senate with respect to the priority of deciding certain points of order made against amendments to general appropriation bills.
